definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_tree_simple"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="type">dark oak</field><field name="base_height">4</field><field name="height_variation_a">2</field><field name="height_variation_b">0</field><field name="force_dirt">TRUE</field><field name="ignore_vines">TRUE</field><value name="dirt"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:PaleDirt</field></block></value><value name="trunk"><block type="state_provider_weighted"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><field name="weight0">200</field><field name="weight1">1</field><value name="entry0"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:PaleLogs</field></block></value><value name="entry1"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:CreakingHeartActive</field></block></value></block></value><value name="foliage"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:PaleLeaves</field></block></value><value name="root_placer"><block type="root_placer_none"></block></value><value name="decorator0"><block type="tree_decorator_attached_to_leaves"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="probability">0.14</field><field name="exclusion_radius_xz">1</field><field name="exclusion_radius_y">2</field><field name="required_empty_blocks">2</field><field name="direction0">DOWN</field><value name="provider"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:PaleVineBottom</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="105" w="222">Placement modifiers are processed from top to bottom. We try to place 4 trees in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">5</field><field name="max">20</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="189">We then move each tree horizontally, so that they don't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_surface_water_depth"><field name="depth">0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is how deep the water can be for the tree to generate. If the value is 0, the tree will never be submerged</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We then move each feature to the highest solid block (which might be underwater)</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="210">We check that the tree doesn't generate in the wrong biome</comment><next><block type="placement_block_survival_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Finally, we check if the position is actually valid. Trees should generate only on blocks that support their sapling.</comment><value name="block"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:PaleSapling</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used to check for the tree position. Generally it should be the sapling of the tree.</comment></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
